entry.content: The word negotiation appeared many a times whenever I am writing, my M.Phil thesis was titled, 'Negotiating family dynamics: A study of single women in Delhi-NCR' , where I tried to understand the negotiation single women do in their day to day lives whether they are either rejecting the institution of marriage or are delaying it, and here I am negotiating domestic responsibilities with my partner in the times of Corona. Negotiation is a funny word, it's like reaching a 'between-space' where no one wins or looses, just comes to an understanding and make peace with it.
